Description: We rarely have enough money coming in to the household every month to cover our costs
It's a struggle to make ends meet at the end of the month, but we just about manage it
My household can mainly cover our household expenses by dipping into savings a little by the end of the month
My household is relatively comfortable in covering our costs and expenses as a household and generally have a little bit
My household can easily cover our costs and expenses and have enough money to treat ourselves and save every month
